trade_plan.invalidation_condition: Exit/invalid if price reclaims VWAP (~249.28) and holds above 249.35 on a 5-min close (preferably with rising volume), indicating the breakdown failed.

analyses.reasoning: Market regime is risk_off with SPY bearish, favoring short continuation. On the 5-min chart AAPL sold off hard, then based/consolidated and is now trading below key moving averages (EMA50/200 ~249 area) and below VWAP (249.28), consistent with a bear-flag style pause after a down leg.
analyses.counter_argument: MACD histogram turning positive plus low RSI/Stoch can precede a mean-reversion bounce; if AAPL reclaims VWAP and the 249â€“250 area (EMA50/200 zone) with improving breadth/market bounce, shorts can get squeezed and the bear-flag thesis fails quickly.
